MQTT Subscriber
info:
# MQTT Subscriber node

 - How to configure this node
    -
    The configuration off this node depend of which LNS or MQTT broker you use.

    - For The Things Network
        - 
        With **TTN LNS** you have to use the following topic :
            ***`v3/{application_id}@ttn/devices/+/up`*** \
        Replace `{application_id}` by your application id in TTN.\
         And don't forget the `@ttn`
    - For The Things Stack
        - 
        With **TTS LNS** you have to use the following topic :
            ***`v3/{application_id}/devices/+/up`*** \
        Replace `{application_id}` by your application id in TTS.

    - For Chirpstack
        - 
        With **Chirpstack LNS** you have to use the following topic :
            ***`application/{application_id}/device/+/event/up`*** \
        Replace `{application_id}` by your application id (it's the number, not the name !).
    - For Actility
        - 
        if you use **Actility LNS** see the [documentation](https://docs.thingpark.com/thingpark-x/latest/Connector/BROKER_MQTT/) for using actillity broker

        - For actility-USMB Broker : ***`univ-smb/devices/+/uplink`***
        - For HiveMQ Broker : ***`mqtt/things/+/uplink`***
        
    - For other LNS or MQTT broker
        - 
        If you use any other LNS or MQTT broker please refer to their documentation to configure this MQTT node.

template:
<===============================================================================>
<=================================   ERROR   ===================================>
<===============================================================================>
{{error.message}}

Please be sure to have all the necessary property for each Bacnet objects:

----------------------------------------------------
| Property              | Uplink         | Downlink |
----------------------------------------------------
| lorawanPayloadName    | required       | required |
| objectType            | required       | required |
| assignementMode       | required       | required |
| instanceNum           | required       | required |
| dataDirection         | required       | required |
| value                 | required       | required |
| downlinkPort          | not required   | required |
| downlinkPortPriority  | not required   | required |
| downlinkStrategie     | not required   | required |
| uplinkToCompareWith   | not required   | required |
----------------------------------------------------

For more information see the documentation on Github.
https://github.com/SylvainMontagny/LoRaBAC

Device concerned: {{device}}
Missing property: {{property}}
<===============================================================================>

<===============================================================================>
<=================================   ERROR   ===================================>
<===============================================================================>
{{error.message}}

Please do not use more Bacnet object than the instance range number or increase it.

For more information see the documentation on Github.
https://github.com/SylvainMontagny/LoRaBAC

Device concerned: {{device}}
Property concerned: bacnet.{{property}}
Actual value: {{value}}
<===============================================================================>
